root.name: Battle: Los Angeles
root.description: OverviewA downloadable FPS that mirrors the events of the Battle: Los Angeles film. You take the role of Corporal Lee Imlay and fight to save the world and humanity from the alien invasion. The game is staggeringly short, with most players being able to complete the campaign start to finish in less than 1 hour. There are no multiplayer or co-op modes.AdvertisementsThe game boasts advertisements for The Green Hornet movie, as well as for Sony Ericsson devices.PC System RequirementsOperating System: Windows XP / Vista / 7Processor: Intel Core Duo E4400 2.0GHz or equivalentGraphics Card: GeForce GT 240 (NVidia) or Radeon HD 2900 Pro (ATI) or equivalentRAM Memory: 2 GBHard Disk Space: 4 GBDirectX: 9.0cSound Card: DirectX 9.0c equivalent
